post:
Howdy!

Cloudrino is proud to offer you the following OpenVZ plan at Low End Pricing.

1 GB RAM

20 GB SSD Storage

500 GB Bandwidth(50Mbit)

1 vCore(E3-1230)

1 IPv4

**Price: $3.75 for the first month then $5 recurring.**

Signup Link:
[https://www.cloudrino.net/signup/index1.php?refid=1](https://www.cloudrino.net/signup/index1.php?refid=1)

Available Locations and test IPs:

1. Pune, India - 43.228.236.1
2. Asheville, USA - 43.225.188.1
3. Melbourne, Australia - 168.1.89.219

Accepted Modes of Payment: Credit/Debit Cards, BitCoins

Cheers!
